title: Metal Fight Beyblade Zero G Specials
original_name: メタルファイト ベイブレード ZEROG
opening_song: "ZEROG Bey! Go! (ZEROG ベイ！ゴー!)" by YU+KI
ending_song: "Ue wo Muite Waratte We Go! (上を向いて笑って We Go！)" by YCHRO (Yuya Karasawa & YU+KI 【唐澤有弥＆YU+KI】)
sinopse: The last seven unaired episodes of "Metal Fight Beyblade Zero G" released on DVD volumes 6 and 7 of the series.
